document_data.name: Zestra's Hot Soups
document_data.mainbody: '''Zestra's Hot Soups''' was an eatery in the city of [[Waterdeep]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Zestra's was located down on [[Carter's Way]] in [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]].
document_data.Services: The shop offered its customers servings of [[salt]]ed sprouts, various [[soup]]s, and [[spice]]d [[sausage]]s in [[gravy]].
document_data.History: ''Circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, [[Fylgard "the Fat" Onister]] of South Ward, a merchant of [[rope]]s, fastenings, and trail-leathers, routinely visited Zestra's after sunset and the closing of his stone, along with his sons.
